messages.content:
Morning Zoe! Here's our support queue status:

📊 **Queue:** 41 total (38 open, 3 resolved)
🎫 **Performance:** Avg response time 3.2 hours 
📈 **CSAT:** 4.3/5.0 (4.17 average across customers)
⏱️ **Volume:** Running about 28 tickets/day

**Top Issues:**
• **Shipping:** 15 tickets (37%) - mostly WISMO and delivery questions
• **Account Management:** 10 tickets (24%) - subscription changes, payment updates  
• **Product Feedback:** 8 tickets (20%) - reviews and recipe questions

**Worth noting:** We're in Memorial Day weekend territory, but shipping tickets look pretty normal - just saw requests for expedited delivery to beat the holiday and some add-on requests to avoid extra shipping costs. The carrier surcharge from 9 days ago doesn't seem to be generating complaints.

Also seeing we're settling back to normal after the Mother's Day promo period ended - subscriber count stabilized at 1,310 with churn back to 5.3%.

Everything's running smooth. The team's handling the queue well and customer satisfaction is holding strong at 4.3.

Need anything specific from me today?
